Typedef Documentation

typedef Boolean(* Filter)(ELogSeverity severity, const char *file, const char *function, int line, void *pUserArg)

Log filter callback this callback should decide whether the message should be printed or not

Parameters:
severity [in] message severity
file [in] source file name
function [in] function name
line [in] line in a file name
pUserArg [in] user defined argument
Returns:
TRUE if the message should be printed

FALSE if the message should not be printed

typedef void(* Logger)(ELogSeverity severity, const char *function, const char *msg, void *pUserArg)

Log output callback

Parameters:
severity [in] log entry severity
function [in] function name
msg [in] log entry text
pUserArg [in] user defined argument

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ELogSeverity

Log entry severity

Enumerator:
eSEVERITY_ERROR  Error message.
eSEVERITY_WARNING  Warning message.
eSEVERITY_INFO  Info message.
eSEVERITY_TRACE  Trace message.
eSEVERITY_DUMP  Dump message.
eSEVERITY_LAST  terminator
